content.detailedDescription: On saturday january 21, 2017 at 8 p.M., i was watching tv in my living room in the dark.  i was sitting on a chaise lounge chair with a westerly window with lace curtains in front of me.  i noticed an abnormally bright light that i thought was a star.  two seconds later it hit me.  we cannot see stars here in tn on a cloudy night.  i live in the country.  there are no city lights, not even street lights.  it was a black night, except for this object.  i got up, grabbed my binoculars and went to the window.  the "star", appeared totally different in the binoculars.  it was sort of hexagonal shaped, and had the most beautiful red, blue, yellow and white lights.  they appeared as a pattern on the side of it.  the colors would pulse and flash.  i was in shock and yet mesmerized.  the object was not moving.  i ran to get my husband from the other room, to make sure that i was seeing what i thought i was seeing.   he came out and witnessed it too.  by this time it was getting smaller, and he left the room.  i continued to watch.  seconds later it was just suddenly there again.  i got out my camera and started snapping pictures.  then i shot a short video.  the camera captured 3 balls of light in a triangle shape that was not visible to the naked eye.  the video caught strange lights moving erratically,  unlike anything i had ever witnessed in my life.  i cannot upload these to this computer, but if you contact me, i will be glad to message them to you.
content.summary: Abnormally bright star changed in the binoculars, and appearance changed for camera

content.detailedDescription:
Watching inauguration on fox news channel jan 20 at 1:50 pm.
saw what i thought first to be formation outline of canada geese to right side of washington dome.  this outline did not move although birds in live shot of dome flew and flags were blowing.  curiously i noticed the lower outline of ufo.
please go to fox news and ask them for tape of inauguration and see for yourself.  was there until the newscast changed the picture to something else at approx. 2:05
this was a total outline of a ufo stationary for at least 12 to 15 minutes.
please do go to look for yourselves!!!!
respectfully,
marion lopizzo
content.summary: Perfect outline of ufo right side of washington dome, 15 mins of stationary outline seen on fox newscast of inauguration

content.detailedDescription: I was working my night shift in my local pub when the dj came in and started to joke about seeing ufo''s for a breif period. so i went outside to look. what i saw shook me and my partner to the core. 3 small lights that changed colour in a triangle formation around a much larger, brighter white light that i personally think was some for of command/mothership. then an airliner looked like it flew in close poximity to the larger object. that is when one of the smaller objects started to follow the airliner at distance over our heads. and as we look back to the original sighting spot, the remaining objects are splitting up at great speed. faster than anything i have ever seen
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 small light's with a larger brighter mothership kind of bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting 2017-01-20, austria, state of lower austria, 16:41h utc, 17:41h local time (cet)

nocturnal lights - two people witness a bright, white light flying rapidly over them at low altitude while driving.

state road ("landesstrasse") b49 (aka "bernsteinstrasse"), driving direction south.

location lat 48 deg 9.010 n, long 16 deg 54.331 e

it was a starry, clear sky.

temperature: -7 deg c. wind: east, 1.0m/s, visibility 6.0km (schwechat airport)

car's speed ca 80km/h at time of sighting, then increasing to ca 100km/h

while i am driving on the b49 on the ramp heading up to the bridge crossing the river danube, i call out to my girlfriend and passenger: "what's that!?" pointing my finger to a white, bright light moving into sight in the upper right corner of the windshield.

i took notice of the light since it was shining strongly and moving. for a split of a second, i thought it was a reflection in the windshield, but it was too bright and moved in a way that did not match any reflections.

the two of us follow the light for approx. 2 seconds as it disappeared beyond the tree line/beyond the other side of the river.

the light was very bright, white in colour, like a star. it did not have any halo, but sharp contours. no other colours or blinking lights were visible.

my girlfriend had a better view of the object than me, who had to focus on the traffic, and she estimates the object to be two fingers wide on arms length as it disappeared over the trees/other side of the river. she made a drawing of the object a few minutes after the sighting and a computer graphic of that drawing is included.

what she saw resembles two parallel rectangles above each other, both wider than taller having the same width, with the bottom one taller than the top one. both rectangles shone with even light and were connected via a thinner, less shining "rod". the whole assembly was slightly tilted to the right. we believe this view represents the object from the rear.

the object flew fairly parallel to the road on a southern trajectory, see attached map.

both of us were impressed how fast the object passed over us and disappeared. no noise was noticed. we felt a bit excited after the sighting.

the objects altitude:
hard to estimate in the darkness. we guess above 300m and below 1000m.

the objects speed:
the distance from losing the object to reaching the beginning of the bridge, with a clear view of the river and the opposite side, was no more than 300m. the object must have covered at least 2000m during the same time to be hidden from view due to the terrain, likely much further since it must've had some altitude as well.

with these pessimistic figures, the object was at least 6.7 times faster than us, who were traveling at approx. 90km/h (we increased speed after the sighting to approx 100km/h, the max allowed on this road). the object's velocity at ground must thus have been at least 600km/h to be able to disappear from view as we reached the beginning of the bridge.

if though our view was indeed not completely blocked by the trees and the object disappeared from sight due to the terrain on the opposite side of the river, which is likely due to that we did not see any light shine through the tree tops whatsoever as it disappeared, the object had covered a distance of over 2000m in 2 seconds, equaling a velocity of at least 1000m/s or 3600km/h.

the location of the sighting is 25km east of the vienna airport (schwechat) and 6km north of the airfield spitzerberg. after talking to head of operations at the airfield 22nd of jan, 2017 10:00h, any operations after dark can be excluded, they are not flying then.

no matching commercial airline flights can be found anywhere close to the area hours before or after the sighting using a flight tracking site.

the rescue helicopters operating in this area are eurocopter ec 135 t2's. they do not match what we saw.

we are living close by and have been traveling on this road and bridge thousands of times.
content.summary: A bright, white light flying rapidly overhead while driving

content.detailedDescription: Walking with with boyfriend after school through open brush field (tall dry grass) 1/2 block from his house. we suddenly observed object flying near us no sound s to n. we were walking w to e. we stopped didn't say anything only that maybe it was a toy. then we noticed the center spinning and window like structures. i commented people couldn't fit inside. then the object tilted east half down west side up and sped out of site. doug and i never spoke about it again as if it never happened. just lately the event reoccurred to me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Donut shape center of circumference spun continuously & had window like structures

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog outside and noticed a unique pattern of lights coming through the clouds at first it looked like a glowing face. i grabbed my cellphone and took a couple of pictures. when i zoomed in on the pictures i noticed a bluegreen orb of light that moved incredibly fast from one picture to the next. these pictures were taken seconds apart.  i have never seen a bluegreen orb of light like this before and after careful consideration,i decided to report it. when i first noticed the lights through the clouds i was in awe at the beauty of the play of light, once i noticed the bluegreen orb in the pictures and its seemingly very rapid movement i was concerned.
content.summary: I took my dog outside and noticed a pattern in the sky breaking through the clouds thats looked like a face of sunlight breaking through the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the viewing bleachers for the launch of the atlas v rocket carrying a missile detecting satellite on jan 19, 2017. we were in a launch delay. i was standing in the bleachers and others were sitting. i was staring a the sky as i had heard that ufo's sometimes are around launches.
i was looking towards the east and suddenly i saw a extremely bright yellow/green light and it was wide, and it was close, it was horizontal to the ground, and it streaked by us. i yelled "look" and people in the stands caught a glimpse. i was so fast that many missed it, but some didn't. 
the woman behind me who was sitting down and just caught a glimpse said it was a meteor, i said no there was something in it.
just before the yellow/green steak of light vanished, for a fleeting bit of a second i saw part of something metallic, it had a seam, and a shape that was rounded. but the yellow/green light obscured all but a small part of the object. i know what i saw and there was definitely something in that light.
the launch was scrubbed by the way due to a wayward aircraft in the flight path of the rocket so we all got on the buses and left. but i was still filled with excitement as i believe that was a ufo.
i checked the web and cannot find any record of a meteor on that night.
content.summary: Close, horizontal, meteor like streak,yellow/green color, just before disappearing you could see a form shrouded in the bright meteor like light.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my back porch at 745 pm and noticed this light in the sky get very bright and i thought it was a plane but it stopped moving and didn't have the red blinking light, and as planes and flew by it disappeared then reappeared, would dim and then get really bright. it made no noise. i watched it for about 3 hours do this, i decided to record the camera has no comparison to how big and bright this light was, towards the end of the longer video you can see it dim and go out. i felt really uneasy so i went in and went to get my kids ready for bed, when i went out an hour later it was gone.
content.summary: Bright big light that hovered for a few hours and kept dimming and dying out when planes were near then would get really bright again

content.detailedDescription: I started getting abducted 2 years ago ... i will tell you a little about my self .. i am a simple guy i never have had a drivers license... i lived  in north las vegas  on las vegas blvd and nellis .. i lived by nellis air force base and i would walk to work .. my work was by the speed way   .So i would walk across the desert 3 1/5 miles to work and 3 1/5 miles home.. one night i seen a ufo ..And that is when it started .. i have been abducted over 15 times ..I think about 30 not sure .. it affected my job i could not sleep i felt like a zombie half the time .. they took me almost every time i had a day off like they new when i was off  and i would get off work for my days off they took me and i never had any days off i was gone the hole time ...I quit my job i worked at for 13 years to get away from them and moved 600 miles away ,,, they steal are abducting me....I do not remember the hole abductions with them ... i would like to no when there is a mufon  meeting in utah so i can find other abductees to talk too i feel alone  ...I been making artwork of them ....Here is one of my pictures i made is close to what they look like i no i am not crazy because of the marks they leave behind on my body and under a black light i have big dark triangle on my right arm and weird writing from them  here are a few marks from them.. they have not took me for about 2 months .. they seem nice ..But i do not know .. i am afraid they mite take me and not bring me back ... i am rely shy and do not like to talk to people that much ... if you can email me the next mufon meeting or event in utah email
content.summary: It had a blinking red light and a few white lights and in shape of a big volkswagen

content.detailedDescription:
Reponse question 1; jã©tais sur le chomage
reponse question 2: jã©tait parti au dã©paneur et cest en revenant que je les est vue 
reponse question 3; je me suis dit enfin une vrai observation dun objet volant non identifier dorigine extraterestre
reponse question 4; ils ce suivait en formation ,ils ã©tais 3 puis il on commencer a faire des zig zag comme si ils essayais dã©vitã© quelque chose ou pour ce protã©gã© dune attaque et cest la que jai remarquã© plus au sud ouest un f18 qui les pourchassait du moin assayait il ã©taits a fond les gaz en post combustion
reponse question 5; jetait comme figer abasourdie impressionnã© avec des frisson ds le dos , jai vraiment ressenti que ca ne pouvait etre autre chose quun ovni dorigine extraterestre , et jai rester dans la lune apres lã©venement je rã©flã©chissait

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were having coffee outside on our patio.  it was 9:40 on jan 4. it was 65. degrees. skies were crystal blue except for jet contrails.  i saw a perfect x formed in the sky by two jet contrails and wanted to get a picture.  there were also birds flying over our pool. using my iphone 6, i snapped a few pictures of the sky.  a few hours later i went to look at the photos. to my amazement, there appeared to be more than just a bird and contrails in the sky. i showed my wife the pictures and zoomed in to see the object. she was also amazed.  4 other people have seen the picture now and they have said looks like a ufo.  
we did not see this object when i took the pictures.  only later when zooming in.   i would not have pursued this today except that the detail and coloring of the ufo was so clear i wanted to share it with someone in this business.  the reference with both the contrails and bird show this object was there.
content.summary: Took pictures of jet contrails forming x. after viewing i found ufo near contrail

content.detailedDescription:
Coming on bus home from school event and 10 min into the drive i noticed a light go up like a ball being thrown in an arch shape and blink out 3\4 into the fall. then it did the same thing but more to the right. i thought this was strange so looked around to see if anyone else was saw what i saw. no one did but everyone was either asleep or having a loud, involved conversation so i wouldnt expect them to be looking out the windows. after i saw the lights and turned to see if anyone saw it i checked the other windows to see if there were any lights or things that could be reflecting on the window to make some sort of illusion. there weren't any lights or anything that could make some sort of illusion. about 10 minutes later i saw one blue light and one red light begin to land like a plane but blink out before it could. i estimated how fast it was going and i guess it was going 40-50 mph. too fast for a plane to be landing. the lights were stable and appeared to be on the same craft. i saw the blue\red thing over an area where there are lots of crops and farming land. the only thing i could think the blue\red ufo could be is maybe a crop dusting plane. but crop dusting usually takes place during the day. we eventually hit some mountains and i could not see them anymore. 

when i saw the first one i was listening to a podcast about paranormal things like ufos bigfoot ghosts and those sort of things. maybe the podcast got me into some sort of state of mind that made me think that these lights were more than they really were.

i was feeling very tired before i saw the first ufo and not necessarily thinking about any particular thing. after i saw the first one i was very dumbfounded and confused about what i just saw. my mind went into overdrive trying to make sense of what i saw trying to logically explain it. i can't think of many things that can explain what i saw.
i would not lie about this. i take this field and many others very seriously but also skeptically.
content.summary: White light fly's in 3\4 of circle. 20 min later red and blue light begin to touch ground like plane than disappear.

content.detailedDescription: When i came in from work,my 2 girls rush me a the door. my kids love to look at the stars. one is 15 and the other is 9...They walk to the front door that night just to look out like any other night but my oldest said they seen the star or what they though was a star because it was brighter then any other they called my wife to look at how bright the star was, my wife was washing dishes as my oldest look around the door where my 9 years old was still watching befor my oldest could trun her head to look back at the light it was gone she ask her sister were did it go my youngest eye got real big and side it shot off to the right noone could see it anymore.My youngest told me what she seen and she said daddy i have never seen something fly away that fast her eyes stared watering up.  i had never seen this look before she has seen something that has changed her way about what you could be looking at in the sky...About three moy ago my wife and kids went to the store on the way back.I was at the house my wife was blowing the horn for me to go outside when i got out there the night was a little cloudy but not raining we could see a light over the cloud but we could not see what it was...I would say it was lightning but the lights never went out it just stayed on over the cloud for about10 minutes...It was night but our phone could not pick it up.
content.summary: A white light that took off faster then you could blink.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in northwestern wayne county i 96 and telegraph area, planes pass by on landing path to metro airport. at sunset i noticed a bright white sphere type light/orb that i guess was about 1000 or so feet in the sky.  no clouds, planes passing regularly on way to metro, but i guess they would have been a mile or so to the east. no stars visiable in any direction, moon not in sky that i could see. first noticed it at 615 pm
still there at 645pm. if it is a planet or star i have not seen it before.
 it has not moved or made any sound. it just seemed to close and bright to be a natural object. feel free to contact or call me.
                   
                         william brownlie sr.


just went outside at 705pm still there
content.summary: Very bright white light, spherer shape, standing still at 1000ft (best guess)  for over 45 min. and still there at time of sending report

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday as my husband and i came from shopping at home , we saw a round light that was falling down the sky! i said to him: let us show where it is! than we drive along the forest to the next village! and than it stands on the sky and shined very bright! and i think it it is so near! i guess it was lesser than 50 meters from the houses! and my husband means! it is enough i don't believe in ufo 'a ! and drive back home. from home i could it see it still 30 minutes, than it was gone! 
today i came from feed my chickens at 7 pm as i saw it again ! my nephew canes to the same time to me ! and i showed him the  objekt and ask him that we had seen this  yesterday too and a friend from the village near us had seen it too! then we want to see it nearer and we drive to the light! but it was to far away ! and after 30 minutes we drive back home again! and from home i could see it until 8:20 pm ! than it was go away ! and i have post it with photo and video on facebook and any people from my surrounding has seen it too !
content.summary: on one place and then it hovered very slowly to the right and from one of another secund it was gone

content.detailedDescription: A friend takes a picture to eduardo vela, but on the back of him, it seems something that never seen when the picture was taken, the photo was taken in the sierra de los cardos in jerez, zacatecas, mexico.
content.summary: A friend takes a picture to eduardo vela, but on the back of it, it seems something that never seen when the picture is taken

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a-school for the navy. i was pt'ing outside the mega building with my class. it was real early. only a little light from the moon lit the hazy sky that morning. though this ufo was very visible. not sure how more people didn't notice it. we had just begun stretching when i caught it listing across the sky out of the corner of my eye. a big black triangle just moseying across the sky. it being a naval air base, i thought maybe it was just a stealth bomber or something. but in retrospect it was too big at that distance to be any bomber i've seen. though i guess maybe it could be some military black project. who knows... i asked around if we had stealth bombers coming into that base but i was told they don't go there. i was really excited! my first(maybe second) real ufo siting. i asked somewhat quietly around me if anybody else saw what i saw. only one person responded. my buddy from boot camp just in front of me doing jumping jacks, *all wide eyed n such* turns around to me and says "i saw it man..." i asked what he thought it was. he excitedly says "i have no idea dude... o_o". we can just make it out above the mega building flying above the trees past the building and past the parking lots and roads leading out of the training facility. which had to be a good 500ft away or more. its just my best guess see as there was a big ass building in front of me. but if i have anything its good eyesight and perception. we watch on as this behemoth keeps moving south across the sky eventually losing track of it as it moves behind more trees and into the night sky. i do remember seeing something on the news about a black triangle moving south out of ohio over the ohio river around that time too. i believe it was before my sighting. eerie stuff(an ohio joke... sry). thats about it though.

  btw. what i meant by it possibly being my second ufo is that when i was staying at my grandmothers place for a bit in ohio. i spent a whole week just perusing the net and watching videos on youtube about ufo's and alien sightings. come friday morning i watched some more ufo vids for a bit then got up for some food. i dragged my lazy ass out to the kitchen where my gma was chillin, drinking her coffee. i sit to talk to her on a stool by the window. me coming off my week long ufo binge. i look out the window into the sky. i start freakin out a bit because what i see way up in the stratosphere is one of those swarm time ufo sightings. it was a bunch of white dots kinda darting around the sky. i was freaked out because i just spent the last week researching ufo's and now i think i see a bunch above my home. i was sure i was going to be abducted that night lol. i only say it may have been my first ufo sighting because i'm not sure if they were ufo's or just a bunch of balloons that got away from somebody. but it was very weird.
content.summary: Black triangle. same as the other that had been spotted recently around that date. it was big but quiet. traveling south bound. no change in direction. also no lights on surface.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my sister and her friend at night. we were talking on the porch when we heard a high-pitched whirring sound. i looked up and screamed. flying above, there was a massive triangle craft that was solid black in color. there was a white light at each point of the triangle. my parents came rushing out just in time to see it disappear over the mountain. everything went silent, then there was a huge rush of wind blowing in the direction the craft went about 10 seconds after we lost sight of it. an hour later, i looked out my window to see a black helicopter flying over the mountain in the same path the craft did.
content.summary: The craft was absolutely massive; bigger than any plane i've ever seen. it was blacker than the sky behind it, and had one large white light at each point of the triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work and turned onto our street. we live a half mile from the end of our street. i could see from there a bright red light in our yard. i sped up to get there as fast as i could bc we have large oak trees blocking my view . when i pulled into our driveway i could see this rectangle shaped thing about the size and shape of a school bus and a long arm hanging down below the object with a red light on the end of it. the arm looked like what i've seen in the comics that the villian doc oc has in spiderman. i got out and watched it slowly and silently take off with its front end tilted upward. i ran inside to get my awesome nikon that i always have with me except that day but when i came back with it i could barely see it anymore. this was near 6pm and it was just before dark so i saw with my eyes with plenty of light this thing.
content.summary: i saw a red light in my yard. sped up and saw a rectangle with a doctor octopus arm with red light at arm end.

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were in the house and noticed from the kitchen window a strange light.

2. it was there and in the next moment it was gone again, 5 minutes later the light was back.

3. a star but at the end we where sure it was an ufo

4. it was abnormally large, has pulsated (red, orange, white, yellow) is slowly pushed down.

5. overexposed, adrenal, torn

6. disappeared behind a house, we repented it but it was gone, we had clear sight on this evening
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 ufo, brightly lit, pursued, slowly move, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My location: i was on the balcony of a hi-rise condo ocean front, 8th floor, facing the ocean (fort pierce fl).
what i saw: an orange sphere (very bright) with a huge orange tail traveling from west to east at great speeds. the tail gave the impression that the sphere was on fire. the tail was enormous, at least 20x the size of the sphere in length and 10x the size of the sphere in width. my first impression was that the iss (international space station) had re-enterred the atmosphere and was burning. this sphere traveled maybe for 10 to 20 degrees in the sky, then the trailing tail stopped, disapeered, was not showing any more. the sphere stopped traveling, was stationary, did not move any more, it changed colour to pale white, then to extream bright white. the sphere (bright white) then vanished, as if its new trajectory was vertical and going away from the earth.
i have been a witness at 2 different times in the past 5 years, but this is the first time i see a orange spere with a fire like orange tail.
content.summary: Orange sphere with very large orange tail (burning type), the tail then disapered as the sphere stopped traveling east, the spere change to very white the vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend in north west edmonton. at exactly 11:45pm i went on the balcony for air. it was a clear night sky. i heard a noise behind and above me as i was sitting in a chair. at first i believed it was a helicopter but i did not see any lights on it. then i heard what sounded like a rumbling engine of a large loud diesel truck. i looked and did not see a truck anywhere on the roads. it wobbled unsteady a little and went slowly in a straight path and the sound was coming from the sky. i looked above me and it was hoovering. at a second look i realized that the noise was coming from the object. i examined it for at least a good 3 minutes before i lost site of it behind a tree. it was a complete rectangle with no lights. i could clearly see it and details of it as the stars and moon reflected off of it and it was moving very slowly. i could not get over how loud it was. i was too mesmerized to find my phone as a guest. it appeared to have patchy metal pieces, not smooth, maybe even dented up. rough looking. i did not observe any windows either. it was very loud like a big clunky diesel engine in the sky. it went very very slow and had clear outlines. and then it disappeared behind a tree and so did the noise. the only thing i noticed is that ear ringing has not given up since i witnessed this.
content.summary: Large loud rectangular flying object moving slowly with no lights

content.detailedDescription: Spotted two different objects while viewing a video of mr. trump's flight to the white house. saw a white saucer shape object. then later near the end of the video and black square one. i took photos off my pc to show my ufo group.
content.summary: Spotted objects while watching a video of mr. trump flying to white house.

content.detailedDescription: On the way home from mums with my daughter in the car i noticed 5 birdlike objects drop from the sky and turn showing the underside which was a shining silver before they flew off diagonally upwards towards the treetops. it was beautiful, precise and unearthly. i said to my daughter, "woah what was that?". she answered a second later, "yeah what was that?" i said, "i thought it was birds at first". she answered,"aliens". we laughed. later i felt excited but a little unnerved!
content.summary: Saw 5 birdlike objects appear flying downwards in formation then flipping changing direction and flying off  diagonally upwards and away out of sight!

content.detailedDescription: I was in louisiana on my way to houston i was a truck driver i had stopped to get fuel and a sandwich as i left the truck stop i noticed bright lights in the sky the lights were very bright blue, red , green, yellow i stop the truck stared at the lights for i'm not sure how long before i realize i had a camera recorder in the bunk i got out of the truck by this time the big bright lights had stop and all i could see was a illuminated metallic gold saucer hovering in the sky  first thought is a ufo its motions just hovered and slowly went south from my location i felt so excited and nervous i lost sight of the object when it was too far away
content.summary: 25min. video of event

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down newfound around 10:55-11:00 pm heading towards canton and off to my left i noticed two bright orbs. at first i thought wow someones porch lights are bright but the closer into view i got i realized that it wasn't porch lights. i slowed down trying to figure out what it was then the orbs came closer and closer then suddenly it was three orbs in the shape of a triangle. it slowly came up the side road and hoovered for a second over exit 33. the craft was probably 10 to 14 feet wide triangle shaped , black, and had one light under the front and two in the back. i lost sight of it as i got onto the interstate heading west.
content.summary: Saw two bright lights to the east slowly moving west then out of nowhere was this triangle shaped craft slowly moving

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas walking fom my shop to the house when i couldn't help but notice a very bright star shaped white light above the mountains in the wws direction. i called my wife out for the viewing, and said she already seen this light approx 2o mins before i did.This light was not travelling like you would see a satelite travel. it seemed quite stationary, and i grabbed my bins to have a better visual. this light under 40x magnification had an orange coloured core, but was moving up,down, left,right,and in an extremely erratic movement,but also in a very discernable pattern where it was not blurred or distorted while watching through the bins. i had my wife watch through the bins and she confirmed that what ever this was, was moving extremely fast, but yet not out all over. the pattern it displayed seemed to have it's boundries, and towards the last visual, the orange lighted core changed to a very bright light (almost blue) with a long tapered tail and it's movement became faster again. it was almost as if whatever was up there, was sending some kind of signal, as none of it's movements were repititious, but did seem to have a purposefull pattern.When this object(?)disappeared behind the mt.Proctor range, the whole mountain ridge was illuminated. after it's disappearance, i immediatly called relatives in the west kootenays to tell them what i seen, and please verify a visual. there part of the country was heavily fogged in.
my wife had told me that about 15 to 20 mins. before i spotted the light, that she heard what sounded lke a low flying aircraft, but the sound ended very abrubtly, and that is when she noticed this bright star shaped light as well. i have lived at this residencey since 1968, and have witnessed many things in the skys over the elk valley, but never nothing this bizare.
content.summary: Noticed avery bright 5 pointed star like light while walking to my house

content.detailedDescription: Here's a video and 2 photos of the ufo johnathan hodge, myself, and another witnessed.  the pictures came before the video. not visible in the photographs, notice stars above and below for comparison in video. planes where also passing closely by and looked nothing of the sort.  as you can see in the video, a 2nd bright light also appeared underneath the first one while we were filming.  any ideas?
content.summary: Bright light appeared/ hovered/ 2nd light appeared hovered

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were coming home from the store and arrived home around 7:45pm. while we were in the driveway we noticed a bright white light. it appeared to grow very bright and bob. the light would turn on and off a few times in a matter of seconds. it appeared to move and make small circles in the sky. nothing drastic, but using a tree as a reference point it changed position in the sky. 

i went into the house and brought my father and brother outside so that they could observe it as well. after a few minutes the object grew dimmer and blinked on and off less. eventually around 8:30pm it disappeared entirely. 

we live in west salem, ohio, and the object appeared in the south western sky. 

looking at the position of the iss, i don't believe that is what we saw. 
perhaps it is possible that we were witnessing venus -- but the object appeared higher in the sky than venus' reported location for tonight. 

i'm not sure what it was, but there were several planes in the sky blinking white and red. this light was pure white and didn't blink at a constant rate like the planes did. instead it would increase in brightness, stay bright for a variable amount of time, then dim. 

it was very far away in the sky and seemed to be higher than most planes at the peak of the experience.
content.summary: Bright white light - turning on and off, bobbing and hovering. faded and disappeared after 30 min

content.detailedDescription:
At 0710hrs on jan 19th, 2017, i was driving north on route 1 in new brunswick, nj and approaching the route 18n exit when i saw a large black triangle looking craft descend below the clouds and immediately begin to disappear.  i estimate that object to be between ½ and ¾ of a mile away.  the sighting lasted two seconds before it simply faded away.
the attached photo is an example of the type of clouds that were present when i observed the object.
content.summary: Black triangle looking craft decended below clouds and faded away
